title: Regulating Intermediate Adsorption and H2O Dissociation on Diatomic Catalyst to Promote Electrocatalytic Nitrate Reduction to Ammonia
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02747G, Paper
Xiaoxue Zhang, Xiaokang Liu, Zhen-Feng Huang, Li Gan, Shishi Zhang, Ru Jia, Muhammad Ajmal, Lun Pan, Chengxiang Shi, Xiangwen Zhang, Guidong Yang, Ji-Jun Zou
Electrochemical conversion of nitrate (NO3−) is an efficient approach to reduce NO3− pollutants and offers a promising alternative for sustainable NH3 synthesis. However, this process is limited by the mismatched...
